name: Archio XML View Connection
description: Maps a single XML connection element to a connection object

mapping.style: {% if style|default %}{% set style = style|merge({'uniqueIdKey': attribute(_context['@attributes'], 'identifier')}) %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_View_Style.json", style)|json_encode }}{%else%}[]{%endif%}
mapping.bendpoints: {% if bendpoint|default %}{% if bendpoint['@attributes']|default %}[{"x": "{{ bendpoint['@attributes'].x }}", "y": "{{ bendpoint['@attributes'].y }}"}]{% elseif bendpoint is iterable %}[{% for point in bendpoint %}{% if not loop.first %},{% endif %}{"x": "{{ point['@attributes'].x }}", "y": "{{ point['@attributes'].y }}"}{% endfor %}]{% else %}[]{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
